body: Hi, I try to create the ASHRAE 90.1 Baseline system 7 with Honeybee openstudio. I found that the Maximum air flow rate for variable volume fan in the air loop is hard sized and the maximum air flow rate in the terminal box is hard sized as well (See images). They should be auto sized and the hard-sized values will significantly under estimate the building energy use and cause long hours of unmet load hours. Does any one know how to fix this issue in the honeybee ? Thank you very much.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4nNzEYyE*G3mTnexY2L8TNcJKIaw6TR4*y9YJVE56M0NM-aXdR8Ix1zsJNi9-3fNbdvGhiohQeeCgtk57UrY5F2haT80yG98/Untitled1.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4nNzEYyE*G2Gh52OpMqN7hSY5PT9fcNebA*ULclUhgWIKDZJWkP4cgBoPdWQ1OLI9mavSsxi-xFZRcxDbRrS183dbQLnhRRN/Untitled.png)
